mapper.select: SELECT MWM.COMPANY_CD , MWM.DIVISION_CD , MWM.IO_RECEIPT_TYPE AS WH_RECEIPT_TYPE , MWT.IO_RECEIPT_TYPE_NM AS WH_RECEIPT_TYPE_NM , MWM.PROCESS_CD , MP.PROCESS_NM , MWM.USE_YN , MWM.UPDATE_BY AS UPDATE_USER_NO ,(SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MWM.COMPANY_CD, MWM.DIVISION_CD, MWM.UPDATE_BY) FROM DUAL ) AS UPDATE_USER_NM , TO_CHAR(MWM.UPDATE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDATE_DATE , ROWIDTOCHAR(MWM.ROWID) AS KEY_ID , MWM.DESCRIPTION FROM MOM_WH_IO_PROCESS_MAPPING MWM , MOM_WH_IO_RECEIPT_TYPE MWT , MOM_PROCESS MP WHERE MWM.COMPANY_CD = MWT.COMPANY_CD AND MWM.DIVISION_CD = MWT.DIVISION_CD AND MWM.IO_RECEIPT_TYPE = MWT.IO_RECEIPT_TYPE AND MWM.COMPANY_CD = MP.COMPANY_CD AND MWM.DIVISION_CD = MP.DIVISION_CD AND MWM.PROCESS_CD = MP.PROCESS_CD AND MWM.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MWM.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MWM.IO_RECEIPT_TYPE = #{whReceiptType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
